Literature.Title: Enhanced Antimicrobial Activity of N-Terminal Derivatives of a Novel Brevinin-1 Peptide from The Skin Secretion of Odorrana schmackeri.
Literature.Author: Zhou X, Liu Y, Gao Y, Wang Y, Xia Q, Zhong R, Ma C, Zhou M, Xi X, Shaw C, Chen T, Wu D, Kwok HF, Wang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>512 µM,Human microvascular endothelial cells HMEC-1:60% Killing=0.1 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=>512µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=>512µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12493(MIC=>512µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12493(MBC=>512µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=>512µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=>512µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=>512µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=>512µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>512µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=>512µM),Candida albicans NCPF 1467(MIC=>512µM),Candida albicans NCPF 1467(MBC=>512µM)
